name: Triangular Peg Solitaire
description:
The classic puzzle board game of peg solitaire, sometimes called an IQ Test.

Jump pegs over adjacent pegs to remove them, and try to leave only one!

Simple to learn, challenging to master.

- 37 different boards ranging in difficulty from very easy to very hard

- All boards have single-peg solutions from any starting position

- Just tap to move,, or to select among multiple moves (when available)
